description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is launching this Request for Information (RFI) to engage industry. This RFI seeks feedback from designers (architects and engineers), steel producers, fabricators & suppliers, EPD and LCA practitioners, general contractors, construction managers and all other interested parties.
full_summary:
## Request for Information: Low-Carbon Steel Products for Government of Canada Building and Infrastructure Projects
### Request Details
**Reference Number**: [cb-757-60790641](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29578/24062-23-633-request-for-information---en.pdf)
**Solicitation Number**: 24062-23-633
**Publication Date**: January 16, 2024
**Closing Date**: March 15, 2024 (14:00:00)
### Description
The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is seeking feedback from industry stakeholders on the procurement of low-carbon steel products for Government of Canada building and infrastructure projects. This Request for Information (RFI) aims to engage designers, steel producers, fabricators, suppliers, and other interested parties in providing answers and feedback related to the questions in Annex 1.
### UNSPSC Codes
The RFI is related to the following UNSPSC codes:
* Basic Steels
* Stainless Steel Alloys
* High-Speed Steels
* Steel Pilings
* Steel Plate Joist
* Steel Framework
* Carbon Steel Bars
* Steel Alloy Bars
* Tool Steel Bars
* Specialty Steel Bars
* Carbon Steel Sheets
* Steel Alloy Sheets
* Specialty Steel Sheets
* Specialty Steel Coils
* Stainless Steel Bars
* Stainless Steel Sheets
* Stainless Steel Coil
* Stainless Steel Strips
### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Shawn Corbett
Email: shawn.corbett@tbs-sct.gc.ca
Telephone: (343) 630-3110

Please let me know if the rewritten text meets your requirements. Note that I excluded unnecessary text, corrected typos, and adapted the text to fit the 400-word constraint. I also improved readability and formatting for easier accessibility. 

Additionally, I corrected the formatting according to your original markdown requirements and included links to the attachments. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with. 


### Revised Entry
Here is a revised entry with pinpointed correction of the hyperlinks.
